short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shortlist profiles directly from your browser. Free for Draup users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
More power to your Recruitment and Sales efforts from Draup!

Found a potential lead on LinkedIn? You no longer have to search for the person in Draup to add it to your lists. With the new Draup Browser extension you can add the same person to the Draup platform with just a click. In case the profile is not available, we will ensure that you get to add the person to your list within the next couple of hours.
 

➤ Enrich your lists with new profiles
Add leads Instantly to your list as you browse on LinkedIn. Sort leads into lists so you can keep your searches organized.
 
----------------------------------------------------

By installing the extension, you agree to Draup’s Terms and conditions and Privacy Policy.
